submission:
class Solution:
    def maximumValueSum(self, board: List[List[int]]) -> int:
        nrow = len(board)
        ncol = len(board[0])
        
        nums = sorted(((board[ir][ic], ir, ic) for ir in range(nrow) for ic in range(ncol)), reverse=True)
        n = len(nums)
        
        ret = -inf
        
        sr, sc = [0] * nrow, [0] * ncol
        acc = 0
        cnt = 0
        
        def dfs(i):
            nonlocal acc, cnt, ret
            
            if i >= n:
                return
            
            x, ir, ic = nums[i]
            if sr[ir] == 0 and sc[ic] == 0: 
                acc += x
                sr[ir] = 1
                sc[ic] = 1
                cnt += 1
                if cnt == 3:
                    ret = max(ret, acc)
                elif acc + (3 - cnt) * x > ret:                    
                    dfs(i + 1)
                acc -= x
                sr[ir] = 0
                sc[ic] = 0
                cnt -= 1
            
            if acc + (3 - cnt) * x > ret:
                dfs(i + 1)
            
        
        dfs(0)
        
        return ret
